flawed_nl_solution:
Angela has 8 more marbles than Allison who has 28 so Angela has 8+28 = <<8+28=63>>63 marbles
Albert has three times as many marbles as Angela who has 63 so Albert has 3*63 = <<3*63=189>>189 marbles
Albert and Allison together have 189+28 = <<189+28=217>>217 marbles
#### 217

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
